view

Class BuyerInventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.BuyerInventory

  • public class BuyerInventory
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Joey This class acts as the view for the inventory model. It will display the current inventory to a buyer user. The buyer will be able to choose which items to purchase and then proceed to checkout.
